name: Fugitive Desires
storyline: You were living a pretty average life until one night, you hear a strange noise coming from upstairs. When you go to check out what it is, you find that a woman has been murdered! You panic and try to call the cops, but suddenly everything goes black as you pass out... When you wake up, you find the bloody murder weapon in your hand! Before you know it, you've been arrested by the police. All of the evidence points to you being the murderer! But that night, a lone detective comes to your aid. He helps you escape the holding cell and tells you that the true murderer is still out there. Will you be able to prove your innocence and find the killer?!
summary: You find yourself on the run after being framed for a crime you didn’t commit! You gain the help of two members of the police as well as a journalist looking to find the truth. Are you ready to meet them?
